subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bartolo Colon’s ascension from faded star to viable major leaguer has reached its apex thus far, as Colon pitched six and two-thirds stellar innings in the Yankees’ victory over the Blue Jays.
snippet: Bartolo Colon’s ascension from faded star to viable major leaguer has reached its apex thus far, as Colon pitched six and two-thirds stellar innings in the Yankees’ victory over the Blue Jays.
